recipe_name: Sweet and sour lamb stir fry
author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan over a medium heat and fry the onion and garlic for 2-3 minutes, until softened. Add the lamb slices and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes. Add the chilli flakes, sesame oil, soy sauce, tomato ketchup, sesame seeds and honey. Stir-fry until the lamb is completely cooked through, then season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. To serve, place the stir fry onto a plate and sprinkle with chives.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ onion, sliced,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  150g/5½oz lamb chump chop, trimmed of fat, sliced ,  ½ tsp chilli flakes,  1 tsp sesame oil,  1 tsp soy sauce,  1 tbsp tomato ketchup,  1 tbsp sesame seeds,  1 tbsp clear honey,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tbsp chopped fresh chives, to garnish
